title: Düsseldorf: Private city tour in a relaxed atmosphere with an insider guide

title: Nijmegen: River Cruise with All-You-Can-Eat Dutch Pancakes

title: Brewery Tour with 3 Kölsch Beer Tastings
meeting_point: Please meet your tour guide at the Kreuzblumen monument. The monument is approximately 150 meters/500 feet in front of the cathedral's grand entrance.

title: SEA LIFE Oberhausen Entry Ticket
meeting_point:
SEA LIFE Oberhausen is located directly at CentrO. Zum Aquarium 1, 46047 Oberhausen.
By car: take the A42 motorway and take the Neue Mitte exit then follow the Sea Life Adventure Park signage. Free parking will be available at CentrO in car park 3 or 4.
By public transport: from Oberhausen at the central train station take the bus to the Neue Mitte stop then walk about 500 meters across the promenade.

title: Düsseldorf: Brewery Tour with Alt Beer Tastings
meeting_point: Meet your guide at the square in front of the historic building "Löwenhaus" -Liefergasse 9. They will be equipped with a black backpack and a signature red nametag.

title: Rhine Tower Entry Ticket
meeting_point: Mit deinem Voucher kannst du dich direkt durch das Drehkreuz am Eingang des Rheinturms scannen.

title: Cologne: 24h Hop-On Hop-Off Sightseeing Bus Ticket
meeting_point: The first stop is opposite Cologne Cathedral, next to Café Reichard. You can also start your tour at any of the other 14 stops along the route.

title: Düsseldorf: Altbier-Safari Beer Walking Tour
meeting_point: Meeting point may vary depending on the option booked.

title: Cologne: The Dark Side of the Dom Tour
meeting_point: The meeting point is outside of the restaurant Trattoria L'Ancora at Heumarkt 47 where you'll find your guide with a name tag!

title: Torchlight tour of the old ironworks
meeting_point: Visitor Center

title: HOUSE OF MAGIC - powered by Ehrlich Brothers
meeting_point:
The House of Magic is located directly at the Westfield Centro Promenade. Coming from the Promenade, take the escalator on the Promenade and you will be right in front of the House of Magic.
From multi-storey car park 1 you can reach us directly via level 2. Free parking is available at the Centro in multi-storey car park 1 and 2.

title: Münster: Old Town Tour with Qualified Guides
meeting_point:
We'll meet at the Chillida sculpture (two steel benches) in the lowered area of the Westphalian Peace Square.
The guide will be wearing a Lupe Münster name tag and will greet guests at the start of the tour.

title: Münster: Nachtwächter-Führung (Erlebnistour)
meeting_point: Lambertikirchpl. 1, 48143 Münster (am Lambertibrunnen)

title: Cologne: IceBar Entry Ticket with Drinks
meeting_point:
Head straight to the IceBar in the center of Cologne near Friesenplatz.

You can park your car in the parking garage that is opposite the bar and the tram lines 3, 4, 5, 12, and 15 go to Friesenplatz, where you can disembark.

title: Tatort x Tour: With Boerne & Thiel on a search for clues in Münster
meeting_point:
in front of the glass facade of the Archaeological Museum on Domplatz
Address: Domplatz 20-22, 48143 Münster

title: Cologne: Old Town Highlights Walking Tour
meeting_point: Meet your guide at the Petrusbrunnen Statue next to the Cologne Cathedral.

title: Düsseldorf: 24-Hour Hop-On Hop-Off Ticket
languages: Spanish, Chinese, Dutch, English, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Russian, Arabic
meeting_point: Meet at bus stop: Kö-Brücke Königsallee/Steinstraße.

title: Düsseldorf: City Sightseeing Cruise on the Rhine
meeting_point:
Look for the ticket office with the red, blue, and white logo, located on the Rheinuferpromenade (Rheinwerft).
Lat: 51.226716 / Lon: 6.770422
Your boat will depart right in front of the ticket office. Show your GetYourGuide QR-Code ticket when you enter the ship.
If you have any questions, the ticket office staff or ship staff will be more than happy to help.

title: Cologne Zoo and Aquarium Entry Ticket
meeting_point: Cologne Zoo is located in the heart of Cologne at Rieler Str. 173, 50735 Cologne. From Cologne main station you can reach the zoo via the underground train line 18 and from Ebertplatz via bus line 140.

title: Visiodrom in Wuppertal: The Immersive 360° Van Gogh Show
meeting_point: Open in Google Maps

title: Cologne: Panoramic City Cruise
meeting_point:
Look for the chalkboards located at landing stages 3 and 7. Here you will find out where your ship will be departing from.
At the KD Ticket Office, you will be informed which ship you will be boarding.

Proceed to board the ship and present your QR-Code ticket as you enter the ship. Be aware that the ship you will be boarding can be located a short walk away.

If you know where your ship will be departing from, you can proceed to board the ship and present your GetYourGuide QR-code ticket as you enter the ship.

Please make sure you have downloaded your ticket (QR-Code) from the GetYour Guide App or have access to your ticket (QR-Code) which was sent to you via Email by Get Your Guide!

title: Borusseum Borussia Dortmund Museum Entry Ticket
meeting_point: Open in Google Maps

title: DüsseldorfCard: Discount Tourist Card
meeting_point: There is no need to exchange your DüsseldorfCard. You can use the card directly on public transit or at any of the participating attractions.

title: Cologne: Melaten Cemetery Life, Love and Death Tour
meeting_point: Meet your guide at the entrance to Melaten Cemetery in Aachener Straße, opposite house no. 251.

title: Virtual Reality Time Travel Experience Ticket
meeting_point: Meet at the activity provider's office.

title: German Football Museum
meeting_point: Platz der Deutschen Einheit 1, 44137 Dortmund.

title: Legoland Discovery Center Ticket
meeting_point: LEGOLAND Discovery Center Oberhausen, Promenade 10, 46047 Oberhausen. By car: Motorway A42 until exit "Neue Mitte", then follow the LEGOLAND Discovery Center - or CentrO signage. Free parking is available at the CentrO. Please use parking garage P3 and P4. The walk to the LEGOLAND Discovery Center is about 5-10 minutes. Paid parking is available in the AQUApark car park (next to McDonalds). By public transport: Take the bus to the "Neue Mitte" stop to reach the LEGOLAND Discovery Center. Pass the entire promenade, and walk for about 15 minutes.

title: Cologne: Guided Highlights Tour

Entrance at Aachener Straße, opposite house number 249.

Go through the gate and to the left of the guardhouse is the meeting point.
